name: Two Nights In Scratch DELUXE
description:
Let's go back to the coding place with TNIS Deluxe, it's just how you remember it!

Controls:

Space - Use door light

Click - Cycle cams, Shut door

Characters and Mechanics:

(ONLY READ IF YOU ARE STRUGGLING WITH THE GAME)

Scratch the Cat:

This diabolical Garfield looking rapscallion can teleport to anywhere he wants and can appear at your left door at anytime, use your left door light if you don't see him on any of the channels.

Elly Elephant:

Follows a set path to your room, if he's not on any of the camera channels, check your right door light.

Shade Cat:

He will start on the beach camera, and its gonna be hard to keep up with him so pay close attention and frequently check your right door light

Sheriff S:

He will start resting in the Center Corridor, and will slowly move towards the poster in your room. If you see the sign in the center hall, do not pull down your monitor, but if you do, he will end your game.

Tips for each Night:

Night 1: 

Spam your door lights and only check the monitors if you cant find Scratch Cat

Night 2: 

Spam your door lights and only check the monitors for Sheriff S and Scratch Cat

Night 3:

Due to certain spoilers and things that have absolutely nothing to do with Youtube's algorithm, I will not explain Night 3 and you will have to figure it out yourself
